properties.description:
Bring Construct data to Consolidted DWH
for rewards project

activities.name: sp_Load Construct Main
activities.description: load data from staging to main table

source.sqlReaderQuery: select *, 'ETL USER' as created_by, 'ETL USER' as modified_by, getdate() as modified_date from financialinstitution.dim_asset_size
select *, 'ETL USER' as created_by, 'ETL USER' as modified_by, getdate() as modified_date from financialinstitution.dim_portfolio_size
select *, 'etl user' as created_by, 'etl user' as modified_by, getdate() as modified_date from financialinstitution.dim_client
select *, 'ETL USER' as created_by, 'ETL USER' as modified_by , getdate() as modified_date from financialinstitution.dim_geographic_region

source.query:
Select COUNT(DISTINCT SETTLEMENT_DATE) as cnt from "CONSOLIDATE"."SEM"."TRANSACTION_SPEND_ANALYSIS_MONTHLY"
where SETTLEMENT_DATE between DATEADD(year,-1,DATE_TRUNC(month,CURRENT_DATE)) and DATEADD(month,-1,DATE_TRUNC(month,CURRENT_DATE))

Select COUNT(DISTINCT DATE_TRUNC(month,ISSUE_DATE)) as cnt from "CONSOLIDATE"."SEM"."ONBOARDING_ANALYSIS"
where ISSUE_DATE between DATEADD(year,-1,DATE_TRUNC(month,CURRENT_DATE)) and DATEADD(month,-1,DATE_TRUNC(month,CURRENT_DATE))

properties.description: this adf is to populates Detection Rate Dashboard
This pipeline populates data into Scorebands view
This pipeline drops files from Dropzone to Raw for Detection rate Dashboard for Feedzai
This pipeline populates data into WBEscore view
This pipeline loads data into WBE table used for reference

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select TABLE_SCHEMA,TABLE_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES 
WHERE TABLE_NAME IN 
('RewardsProgramBINs',
'RewardsProgramBINExtensions'
)

select TABLE_SCHEMA,TABLE_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES 
WHERE TABLE_NAME IN 
('RewardsConfiguration','RewardsConfigurationStatementOptions'
)
